item.title: How to Buy Bitcoin Safely: A First-Timer's Guide
item.description: So you want to buy Bitcoin. Maybe a friend won’t stop talking about it. Maybe you read about some company adding it to their treasury. Or maybe you’re just curious what all the fuss is about. Whatever brought you here, let’s get one thing straight: your first crypto purchase should be boring. No leverage. No day trading. No chasing the next 100x coin. Just you, some Bitcoin, and a safe place to store it.
